title: Covid-19: One third of humanity under virus lockdown
description: Covid-19: One third of humanity under virus lockdownIndia's billion-plus population went into a three-week lockdown on Wednesday, with a third of the world now under orders to stay indoors, as US politicians agreed to spend $2 trillion to counter the economic…
content: India's billion-plus population went into a three-week lockdown on Wednesday, with a third of the world now under orders to stay indoors, as US politicians agreed to spend $2 trillion to counter the economic damage of the coronavirus pandemic. Financial marke… [+1437 chars]
